PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12082022-11-10,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActUnited Nations Act
SubjectRegulations Implementing the United Nations Resolution on Haiti
PrecisREGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTION ON HAITI in order to (1) implement a freeze on all funds, other financial assets and economic resources within Canada which are owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, by any individuals or entities designated in the Resolution, or by any individuals or entities acting on their behalf or at their direction, or by entities owned or controlled by them; and (2) implement an arms embargo on any designated individuals or entities designated in the Resolution.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0237 Publication Date: 2022-11-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolution on Haiti
precis: REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTION ON HAITI in order to (1) implement a freeze on all funds, other financial assets and economic resources within Canada which are owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, by any individuals or entities designated in the Resolution, or by any individuals or entities acting on their behalf or at their direction, or by entities owned or controlled by them; and (2) implement an arms embargo on any designated individuals or entities designated in the Resolution.
